aima.core.util

Class FrequencyCounter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.util.FrequencyCounter<T>

  • public class FrequencyCounter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for keeping counts of objects. Will return 0 for any object for which it has not recorded a count against.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Mike Stampone

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FrequencyCounter()
      Default Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Remove all the currently recorded frequency counts.
      java.lang.Integer getCount(T key)
      Returns the count to which the specified key is mapped in this frequency counter, or 0 if the map contains no mapping for this key.
      java.util.Set<T> getStates() 
      void incrementFor(T key)
      Increments the count to which the specified key is mapped in this frequency counter, or puts 1 if the map contains no mapping for this key.
      double probabilityOf(T key)
      Returns the count to which the specified key is mapped in this frequency counter, divided by the total of all counts.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • FrequencyCounter

        public FrequencyCounter()
        Default Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getCount

        public java.lang.Integer getCount(T key)
        Returns the count to which the specified key is mapped in this frequency counter, or 0 if the map contains no mapping for this key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key whose associated count is to be returned.
        Returns:
        the count to which this map maps the specified key, or 0 if the map contains no mapping for this key.

      • incrementFor

        public void incrementFor(T key)
        Increments the count to which the specified key is mapped in this frequency counter, or puts 1 if the map contains no mapping for this key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key whose associated count is to be returned.

      • probabilityOf

        public double probabilityOf(T key)
        Returns the count to which the specified key is mapped in this frequency counter, divided by the total of all counts.
        Parameters:
        key - the key whose associated count is to be divided.
        Returns:
        the count to which this map maps the specified key, divided by the total count.

      • getStates

        public java.util.Set<T> getStates()
        Returns:
        a set of objects for which frequency counts have been recorded.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Remove all the currently recorded frequency counts.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
